me.title: Hello.
me.content: My name is vinh, I'm a programmer. This is my corner on the Internet. I mostly write about technology related stuffs, my family, some time I also mention my trust in Jesus Christ, my Savior.

entry.title: Better developer
entry.author: vinh
entry.preview: My steps for better developing myself
entry.content:
• Don't re-invent the wheel
  • Keep on not re-inventing the wheel
  • Try to understand the wheel
  • Understand the wheel
  • Try to improve the wheel
  • Keep improving the wheel
  • Invent the jet
